title: Cassio Chromas
body: I like the new modifications, definitely an improvement, and very quick too, the "Day" one looks more appealing now, so do the other two. Thanks a lot riot!

replies.body:
Hiya! 

Thanks for taking the time to leave feedback! Glad to see such a positive response to the updates. ^-^ Which one is your favorite?

> [{quoted}](name=Riot KateyKhaos,realm=NA,application-id=A8FQeEA8,discussion-id=x58ikQcA,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2015-07-31T17:32:10.691+0000)
>
> Hiya! 
> 
> Thanks for taking the time to leave feedback! Glad to see such a positive response to the updates. ^-^ Which one is your favorite?

Definitely Day and night are my favorites, I think Dusk is fine, I liked the suttle purple shades the last version had though.

Might be a mistake at Surr@20 but they have labelled the red one "day" and the blue one "dusk"

I feel it should be the other way round, you know clear blue sky and warm red sunset.
